"use client" import { useState } from "react" import { X } from "lucide-react" import "./Modal.css" const CreateTaskModal = ({ isOpen, onClose, onCreate, isSubtask, parentTaskTitle }) => { const [title, setTitle] = useState("") const [description, setDescription] = useState("") const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false) if (!isOpen) return null const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() if (!title.trim()) return setIsSubmitting(true) await onCreate({ title, description }) setTitle("") setDescription("") setIsSubmitting(false) } return (

{isSubtask ? `Add Subtask to "${parentTaskTitle}"` : "Create New Task"}

setTitle(e.target.value)} placeholder="Enter task title" autoFocus />
